articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero gets new trailer at SDCC 2022
articles.description: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero got a new trailer during its San Diego Comic-Con panel that gives a look at the Piccolo and Gohan starring movie. The film will be release in America on Aug. 4.
articles.content: Piccolo and Gohans starring turn is almost here

articles.author: Susana Polo
articles.title: SDCC 2022 animated Last Airbender movie will star Aang and friends as adults
articles.description: At San Diego Comic Con 2022, Nickelodeon announced that the next animated Avatar: The Last Airbender movie will focus on Avatar Aang, and his friends Katara, Sokka, Toph, and Zuko — as adults!

articles.author: Sadie Gennis, Danette Chavez
articles.title: The best SDCC 2022 trailers
articles.description: Watch the biggest trailers released at San Diego Comic Con 2022, including Dungeons and Dragons, The Walking Dead, The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power, and Teen Wolf: The Movie.

articles.author: Susana Polo
articles.title: SDCC 2022: Rick and Michonne will return in new Walking Dead miniseries
articles.description: At the Walking Dead panel at San Diego Comic Con 2022, the cast and crew behind AMC’s The Walking Dead television universe revealed plans for a miniseries all about Andrew Lincoln’s Rick Grimes and Danai Gurira’s Michonne.
articles.content: Its been four years since AMC announced that it would continue the story of Rick Grimes in the form of a whole trilogy of made-for-TV movies. And at this weekends Walking Dead panel at San Diego Comi… [+1395 chars]

articles.author: Joshua Rivera
articles.title: SDCC 2022: Batman is squaring off against Spawn... again
articles.description: Batman and Spawn are once again starring in a crossover comic coming soon from DC Comics, written by Todd McFarlane and drawn by Greg Capullo.
articles.content:
Heres something only 90s kids will understand: Batman and Spawn are together again in a comic book for the first time since 1994. 
At DCs Jim Lee & Friends panel at San Diego Comic-Con, the publ… [+1412 chars]

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: The Walking Dead season 11 part 3 release date announced at San Diego Comic Con
articles.description: The last eight episodes of The Walking Dead on AMC will air  beginning October 2, the network announced at SDCC 2022. The final trailer teases all-out war.
articles.content: The Walking Dead season 11 part 3 or season 11C, whatever folks are calling it, this is the end of AMCs long-running survival adventure will premiere October 2, 2022. AMC revealed the release date in… [+1858 chars]

articles.author: Zosha Millman
articles.title: SDCC 2022: Is Anson Boon playing Annator or Sauron in Rings of Power?
articles.description: With Amazon’s Lord of the Rings show, no one knows what Sauron looks like. But SDCC might’ve let us see Anson Boon as Annator, if you’re fine taking a leap to believe such a thing, ahead of the Sept. 2 release date on Prime Video.
articles.content: San Diego Comic-Con has given us another look at Amazon Primes The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power and it is... good? While the world of IP-driven properties has to work harder these days to ge… [+2647 chars]

articles.description: X-Men fans finally heard some story details about X-Men 97, the upcoming animated reprisal of X-Men: The Animated Series (1992-97), at a Marvel Studios panel at San Diego Comic Con on Friday.

articles.title: Tales of the Walking Dead Trailer released at SDCC 2022
articles.description: AMC released the trailer for The Walking Dead anthology series Tales of the Walking Dead at San Diego Comic-Con on Friday.
articles.content: AMC released the trailer for The Walking Dead anthology series

articles.title: Star Wars series The Acolyte casts Amandla Stenberg in starring role
articles.description: Disney has announced that Amandla Stenberg has been cast in a role in the Star Wars series The Acolyte. Both Stenberg and Star Wars shared the news Friday.
